law.text: The City shall not be held liable, for any cause, for failure to detect any unit failing to operate adequately, or failure to identify any specific hazard, which may result in contamination of its public water supply, nor shall this article diminish the responsibility of any property owner from whose property a contamination of the public water supply may originate. (Ord. No. 1987-20, ยง1, 7-21-87)
